title: Pettypiece: Wal-Mart taking time to turn around company
itunes:title: Pettypiece: Wal-Mart taking time to turn around company
description:
Bloomberg's Shannon Pettypiece weighs in on Wal-Mart's turnaround process on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
